item.title: 加拿大人改飞其他国家，西捷航空九条美国夏季航线停航
item.description: 由于需求下降，WestJet 将暂停加拿大和美国之间的九条航线。【原文：WestJet is suspending nine routes between Canada and the US due to lower demand.】

item.title: 卡塔尔借力体育提前实现 2030 年旅游目标
item.description: 卡塔尔斥资数十亿美元筹备 2022 年世界杯足球赛，赌的就是全球瞩目将引发持久的旅游业繁荣。三年过去了，这场豪赌似乎得到了回报。【原文：Qatar spent billions of dollars preparing for the 2022 World Cup, betting that the global spotlight would spark a lasting tourism boom. Three years on, that gamble appears to be paying off.】

item.title: Coloplast 辞退首席执行官，寻求恢复投资者信任
item.description: Coloplast A/S 公司解雇了首席执行官，以恢复投资者的信心，因为这家医疗设备制造商未能为股东带来足够的回报。【原文：Coloplast A/S fired its chief executive officer to restore investor confidence after the medical equipment maker failed to deliver sufficient shareholder returns.】

item.title: 英伟达财报发布前，AMD和Arm提供了了解人工智能领域的窗口
item.description: 在 Nvidia 公司发布财报前几周，两家芯片制造商将在未来几天发布财报，让投资者了解人工智能基础设施的需求状况。【原文：Two chipmakers reporting earnings in the coming days will give investors insight into how demand for artificial intelligence infrastructure is holding up a few weeks ahead of Nvidia Corp.’s results.】

item.title: 挪威房价九个月来首次下跌
item.description: 在推迟货币宽松政策以及全球贸易忧虑导致消费者情绪恶化之后，挪威调整后的房价出现了九个月来的首次下跌。【原文：Norway’s adjusted home prices fell for the first time in nine months after a delay in monetary easing and a worsening of consumer sentiment amid worries over global trade.】

item.title: Grubhub 所有者 Wonder 在新一轮融资中估值突破 70 亿美元
item.description:
马克-罗尔（Marc Lore）的美食馆初创公司正在向包括 NEA、Accel 和 GV 在内的投资者募集 6 亿美元资金。【原文：

Marc Lore’s food hall startup is raising $600 million from investors including NEA, Accel and GV.

】

item.title: 中国计划周三通报市场稳定措施
item.description: 在中国经济前景日益受到美国关税威胁之际，中国央行和金融监管机构将于周三举行新闻发布会，讨论旨在稳定市场的政策。【原文：China’s central bank and financial regulators will hold a press briefing on Wednesday to discuss policies aimed at stabilizing markets, as the country’s economic outlook comes under increasing threat from US tariffs.】

item.title: 赞比亚监管机构批准投资 2.7 亿美元建设刚果输电线路
item.description: 赞比亚能源监管机构批准建设一条高压输电线路，将铜矿丰富的西北省与刚果民主共和国连接起来。【原文：Zambia’s energy regulator approved the construction of a high-voltage transmission line to link its copper rich North-Western province to the Democratic Republic of Congo.】

item.title: 期权专家放弃小盘股对冲，法国巴黎银行表示买入
item.description: 法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA）的策略师表示，在美股创下 20 年来最长连涨纪录后，现在是防范小盘股下跌的好时机。【原文：After US stocks logged their longest winning streak in 20 years, it’s a good time to protect against a slide in small-cap names, according to a strategist at BNP Paribas SA.】

item.title: 投票后罗马尼亚列伊下挫，央行放松控制
item.description: 罗马尼亚政府垮台后，该国货币贬值超过 2%，突破了 1 欧元兑换 5 列伊的关键水平。【原文：Romania’s currency weakened more than 2% and breached the key level of 5 leu per euro after the country’s government collapsed.】

item.title: Capital A 将寻求从香港上市融资 2 亿美元
item.description: 亚航母公司 Capital A Bhd. 希望通过在香港的二次上市融资至少 2 亿美元，以吸引中国大陆投资者并加速增长。【原文：Capital A Bhd. wants to raise at least $200 million from a secondary listing in Hong Kong as the parent of AirAsia looks to tap mainland Chinese investors and accelerate growth.】

item.title: 欧盟预计特朗普将对其 5,490 亿欧元商品征收更广泛的关税
item.description: 欧盟预计，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易调查将使该集团面临美国关税的商品数量增至5490亿欧元（约合6220亿美元），从而使跨大西洋冲突升级，因为双方正试图通过谈判减少征税。【原文：The European Union expects President Donald Trump’s trade investigations to boost the amount of the bloc’s goods facing US tariffs to €549 billion ($622 billion), escalating the transatlantic conflict as the two sides are trying to negotiate a reduction in levies.】

item.title: 顶级银行称西班牙停电导致经济损失 4 亿欧元
item.description: 据西班牙最大的国内银行估计，西班牙有史以来最大规模的停电使该国经济损失近 4 亿欧元（4.54 亿美元）。【原文：Spain’s biggest ever blackout wiped almost €400 million ($454 million) off the economy, according to an estimate by the country’s largest domestic bank.】

item.title: 金鹅启动 4.8 亿欧元债券销售，为债务再融资
item.description: 奢侈品、生活方式和运动服装产品供应商 Golden Goose SpA 计划出售 4.8 亿欧元（5.44 亿美元）六年后到期的优先担保浮动利率票据。【原文：Golden Goose SpA, a provider of luxury, lifestyle, and sportswear products, plans to sell €480 million ($544 million) of senior secured floating-rate notes maturing in six years.】

item.title: 美国长期收益率因经济走强迹象而创下两周新高
item.description: 美国长期国债下跌，原因是有迹象表明，全球最大经济体的韧性比之前想象的更强，市场参与者对更高的期限溢价进行了定价。【原文：US long-end Treasuries fell as market participants priced a higher term premium amid signs the world’s largest economy is more resilient than previously thought.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯债务水平创石油负增长以来最大增幅
item.description: 在政府披露了更多的私人市场借款后，沙特阿拉伯的债务水平在第一季度跃升至历史最高水平。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s debt levels jumped the most on record in the first quarter after the government revealed more borrowing in the private markets.】

item.title: 台湾中央银行四月买入美元，增加储备金
item.description: 在岛内货币升值压力日益增大的情况下，台湾央行证实 4 月份买入了美元，外汇储备上升 0.8%，达到 5,828 亿美元。【原文：Taiwan’s central bank confirmed it bought US dollars in April, with foreign reserves rising 0.8% to $582.8 billion, amid growing appreciation pressure on the island’s currency.】

item.title: 致命骚乱拖累肯尼亚经济增速降至大流行病以来最慢
item.description: 在遭受了致命抗议和洪灾的打击后，肯尼亚的经济增长速度达到了冠状病毒大流行以来最慢的水平。【原文：Kenya’s economy grew at its slowest pace since the coronavirus pandemic after it was battered by deadly protests and floods.】

item.title: 您不再需要在美国投资
item.description:
美元摇摆不定，不是每个人都对国债情有独钟，美国可能会走向衰退。但是，您的钱还有其他去处。【原文：

The dollar is wobbling, not everyone is crazy about Treasuries anymore and America may be headed for recession. But there are other places for your money.

】

item.title: 安巴尼的 Jio Finance 计划首次出售 1.18 亿美元卢比债券
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由亚洲最富有的商人穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）拥有的影子贷款公司吉奥金融有限公司（Jio Finance Ltd.）正计划通过其首次债券销售，在在岸市场筹集多达 100 亿卢比（约合 1.18 亿美元）的资金。【原文：Jio Finance Ltd., a shadow lender owned by Asia’s richest businessman Mukesh Ambani, is planning to raise as much as 10 billion rupees ($118 million) in the onshore market through its first ever bond sale, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 高盛称熊市反弹是常态
item.description: 过去两周股市的急剧回升是典型的熊市反弹，这种反复无常的波动意味着，无论市场突然向哪个方向发展，几乎每个投资者都会经历痛苦。【原文：The steep recovery in equity markets over the past two weeks is typical of bear market rallies, and the erratic swings mean almost every investor will experience pain whichever direction the market suddenly moves.】

item.title: 孤星银行首席执行官表示，诺沃银行的目标是在 6 月进行首次公开募股（IPO）。
item.description: 葡萄牙诺沃银行（Novo Banco SA）首席执行官马克-伯克（Mark Bourke）表示，该银行为可能进行的首次公开募股起草招股说明书的工作 "进展顺利"，其目标是最早在 6 月份进行首次公开募股。【原文：Portuguese lender Novo Banco SA is “well advanced” in drafting a prospectus for a possible initial public offering, which it aims to carry out in June at the earliest, Chief Executive Officer Mark Bourke said.】

item.title: 湄公河资本支持的 F88 计划最早于 7 月在越南上市
item.description: 湄公河资本有限公司（Mekong Capital Ltd.）支持的 F88 公司董事长兼首席执行官 Phung Anh Tuan 在接受采访时说，该公司计划最早于 7 月在非上市公众公司市场（UpCom）上市，并在两年后开始在胡志明市证券交易所交易。【原文：Mekong Capital Ltd.-backed F88 Co. plans to list its shares on the Unlisted Public Company Market, or UpCom, as early as July and start trading on the Ho Chi Minh City Stock Exchange in two years, Phung Anh Tuan, chairman and chief executive officer, said in an interview.】

item.title: 新加坡部长为与洗钱者共进晚餐辩护
item.description: 根据聚会的照片和一位自称接待过他们的当地商人提供的信息，在一位中国出生的居民因新加坡一桩创纪录的洗钱案被定罪前几年，三位新加坡部长曾与他共进晚餐。【原文：Three Singapore ministers dined with a China-born resident years before he was convicted in a record money laundering case in the city-state, according to photos of the gatherings and a local businessman who said he hosted them.】

item.title: WiseTech 的怀特上台承诺 "最高质量 "的管理
item.description: 慧科全球有限公司（WiseTech Global Ltd.执行主席理查德-怀特（Richard White）在一次董事会清理中重新确立了对这家丑闻缠身的公司的控制权，两个多月后，他重返公众舞台，大力承诺加强公司监督。【原文：WiseTech Global Ltd. Executive Chairman Richard White returned to the public stage with a vigorous pledge to improve corporate oversight, a little more than two months after he reasserted his control of the scandal-plagued company in a boardroom cleanout.】

item.title: 奇货可居：Brad Setser 谈台币大涨（播客）
item.description: 自四月初的动荡以来，有几个市场已经真正稳定下来。但奇怪的、不寻常的事情仍然层出不穷，尤其是在货币领域。过去几天，我们看到台币大幅飙升。这一点很重要，部分原因是台湾的人寿保险公司是美元资产（如公司债券）的主要买家。突然之间，他们所持有的这些资产的价值将受到重创，而损失只能部分对冲。因此【原文：There are several markets that have really settled down since the tumult of early April. But strange, unusual things are still popping up, particularly in the currency space. Over the last few days, we’ve seen a huge surge in the Taiwan dollar. This is important, in part, because Taiwanese life insurance companies are major buyers of US dollar assets, such as corporate bonds. item.title: 瑞士央行施莱格尔称瑞士法郎确实大幅走强
item.description: 瑞士央行行长马丁-施莱格尔（Martin Schlegel）表示，瑞士法郎的升值非常明显，决策者仍随时准备在必要时干预外汇市场，以稳定物价。【原文：The Swiss franc’s appreciation has been very noticeable and policymakers remain ready to intervene in foreign-exchange markets if needed for price stability, according to central bank President Martin Schlegel.】

item.title: 德国私营部门 4 月出人意料地略有增长
item.description: 在美国宣布加征关税扰乱全球经济后的几周内，德国私营部门在四月份勉强实现了增长，情况好于最初的报告。【原文：Germany’s private sector managed to eke out growth in April, faring better than initially reported in the weeks after US tariff announcements upended the global economy.】

item.title: 捷克通胀放缓超预期，降息预期升温
item.description: 捷克通胀放缓幅度超过预期，达到七年来最慢，这几乎巩固了央行将在本周降息的预期。【原文：Czech inflation eased more than expected to the slowest pace in seven years, all but cementing expectations that the central bank will deliver an interest rate cut this week.】
